paragraph.title: G-Coin now live on PC
paragraph.description: We've just made in-game purchasing easier with the addition of G-Coin to PC! Starting now, purchases made in the PUBG store will pull from your refillable G-Coin wallet balance instead of requiring a cash transaction for each item. Even better, you can earn up to $5 worth of G-Coin by completing missions in Survivor Pass: Highlands, allowing you to choose your own reward from the PUBG Store. For more details on the switch to G-Coin, please visit pubg.com.

Season 9 is here with an all new Survivor Pass! This shortened pass lasts for only 2 months, but also has a lower requirement of Level 50, letting you unlock all its great rewards faster! With the new Season comes a brand new seasonal map. Paramo lies surrounded by clouds in the highlands of a forgotten civilization, and comes with exciting new gameplay features such as Supply Helicopters, the Critical Response Kit, and Molten Lava from a live volcano! Paramo also features dynamic terrain, where areas change from match to match, giving you a new experience each time you play! Grab the Survivor Pass, discover the lost city of Paramo, and take on the Battlegrounds like never before!

6.title: Discover the endless possibilities of Paramo
